TEST_NAME: Redwood Regions should be correctly placed
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when aap.page_template = 'Generic' 
                         then case when appr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb' 
                                   then case when appr.display_position != 'Page Header'
                                             then 'BREADCRUMB_GENERIC'
                                             end
                                   when appr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
                                   then case when appr.display_position not in ('Smart Filters & Search', 'Smart Filters')
                                             then 'SMARTFILTER_GENERIC'
                                             end
                                   when appr.template = 'Dialog'
                                   then case when appr.display_position != 'Dialogs, Drawers and Popups'
                                             then 'DIALOG_GENERIC'
                                             end
																	 when appr.template = 'Page Header'
                                   then case when appr.display_position != 'Page Header'
                                             then 'PAGE_HEADER_GENERIC'
                                             end
                                   end
                        end child_code,
                    aap.page_template, 
                    appr.application_id, 
                    appr.page_id, 
                    appr.display_position, 
                    appr.region_id component_id, 
                    appr.last_updated_by, 
                    appr.last_updated_on,
                    appr.region_name,
                    case when appr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
                         then 'Page Header'
                         when appr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
                         then 'Smart Filters & Search'
                         when appr.template = 'Dialog'
                         then 'Dialogs, Drawers and Popups'
						 						 when appr.template = 'Page Header'
                         then 'Page Header'
                         end correct_position,
                    appr.template,
						        appr.workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions appr
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on appr.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                 and appr.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 1000
            )
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
        std.application_id, 
        std.page_id,
        null created_by, 
        null created_on, 
        std.last_updated_by, 
        std.last_updated_on, 
        case when std.child_code is not null
             then apex_string.format('Region `%0` (page %1, app %4) is placed in the `%2` but should be in the `%3`', 
                            p0 => std.region_name, 
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.display_position, 
                            p3 => std.correct_position,
														p4 => std.application_id) 
             end validation_failure_message, 
        case when std.child_code is not null
             then apex_string.format('Region `%0` (page %1, app %2) in incorrect position', 
                            p0 => std.region_name, 
                            p1 => std.page_id,
														p2 => std.application_id) 
             end issue_title,
        std.child_code,
        std.page_template, 
        std.display_position,
        std.region_name,
        std.correct_position,
				std.component_id,
				null parent_component_id,
				std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
\[Redwood regions are placed correctly\]

*   BREADCRUMB\_GENERIC : In Redwood, Breadcrumbs should be in the 'Page Header' position
*   DIALOG\_GENERIC : Dialogs should be in the position 'Dialogs, Drawers and Popups'
*   SMARTFILTER\_GENERIC : Smart Filters should be placed in the 'Smart Filters & Search' position
FIX:
*   BREADCRUMB\_GENERIC : Move breadcrumb
*   DIALOG\_GENERIC : Correct the placement
*   SMARTFILTER\_GENERIC : Move to 'Smart Filters & Search' position
